metrics.name: neo4j_exporter_ce_transactions_active_total
metrics.help: Total number of active transactions in the Neo4j database
metrics.query: SHOW TRANSACTIONS YIELD transactionId WITH count(transactionId) AS activeCount RETURN activeCount

metrics.name: neo4j_exporter_ce_transaction_elapsed_seconds
metrics.help: Elapsed time in seconds of each active Neo4j transaction
metrics.query: SHOW TRANSACTIONS YIELD transactionId, username, elapsedTime.seconds AS elapsedSeconds RETURN transactionId, username, elapsedSeconds
